group_1.textRight: Enough, let's finish this!
[se:6101_hit_slash_01_vh][name:sprite_0:effect_7001_attack02]Seyaaaaa!!!

group_1.textCenter: It’s Meguru's Best Savior's Super Deadly @Transcendental Attack!
(I'm really glad Momoko came to rescue me then...)
(She even brought me to the Coordinator.)
(...But well, I'm still not really sure what the @Coordinator does...)

group_1.textRight: Hmm, I'm glad I rescued Meguru, but the situation @was pretty bad...
This witch was really tough.

group_1.textLeft: Tough?

group_1.textRight: I hit the witch over and over.
But it kept dodging or blocking...
And just when I thought I beat it... @It stubbornly got up again.

group_1.textLeft: A witch strong enough that even a veteran like @Momoko had trouble...

group_1.textRight: No, it didn’t feel all that strong...
Just with Meguru's commentary it felt like I was in a pro-wrestling match.
If Meguru was stronger,
Meguru wouldn't have caused Momoko so much trouble...
*Sniff*... Player Meguru will reflect on her actions...!

group_1.textLeft: No, no, don't worry about it.
It was quite the thrill.
Your live commentary was very motivating.
I felt exhilarated, dramatically winning at the end.

group_1.textRight: Th-Thank you...

group_1.textLeft: Ooh, is Meguru good at giving live commentary?

group_1.textRight: Good at it... @That was my wish to Kyubey.
I wished to be a popular MC.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, so that's how it is.

group_1.textRight: My MC skills have improved, but I don't feel like I’m @any more popular.
At this rate, the broadcasting club I joined to further @my dream is still going to be disbanded...
Maybe... Kyubey tricked Meguru...!?
Meguru's wish had nothing to do with fighting @witches in the first place...
Waaah, what should I dooo~~~? What is to be Player Meguru's future!?

group_1.textLeft: Calm down, Meguru...
That's right.
You've only just become a Magical girl, Meguru.
Maybe you simply haven't seen the wish’s @results yet.

group_1.textRight: Then, when will Meguru see the results!
What do I do to become a popular MC!?
*Sigh*...

group_1.textLeft: Hmm, good question...
I only just started as a Coordinator myself, and I @don't have many clients.
So I've got it pretty tough too...
How about this, what if I ask you a favor as thanks @for your patronage?

group_1.textRight: A favor...?

group_1.textLeft: Yes.
After all, Momoko did go to the trouble of bringing @you here as a customer.

group_1.textRight: Why so suddenly...? @Something feels off...

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle*
Hey Meguru, would you like to try working as @an MC?

group_1.textCenter: Even when I do my best, I don't get anywhere. @And I'm mentally weak as hell.
